name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForSolidOrganTransplantation
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Solid Organ Transplantation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to solid organ transplantation and is listed as an immunocompromised condition on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes solid organ transplant surgeries.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes solid organ transplant evaluation.)
